arts.ttl: West Ham United 3 – 2 Burnley | Final whistle, first impressions
arts.sum: West Ham came from behind again to win their second game in succession – for the first time this year – after conceding first against Scott Parker’s Burnley at London stadium. Unlike the win over Newcastle, this was a more scrappy, less flowing performance relying more on force of will and a steely determination by […] Source

arts.ttl: West Ham United 3 – 2 Burnley | Player ratings as West Ham come from behind again
arts.sum: West Ham started slowly and grew into the game as Burnley opened the scoring: A stupid late mistake by Alphonse Areola made the score closer than it should have been, but a win at a canter again for Nuno’s men. More later in the afternoon with the ‘final whistle, first impressions’ article due soon. Player […] Source

arts.sum: The Hammers last won twice in a row in February.

arts.ttl: West Ham United vs Burnley – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: West Ham United host Burnley on Saturday in their first home match since securing a vital 3-1 win over Newcastle United. That victory was their first of the season at the London Stadium. It also ended a damaging six-game winless run. Now, Nuno Espírito Santo is aiming to guide his side to back-to-back league wins […] The post West Ham United vs Burnley – Predicted lineup and team news first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Burnley XI vs West Ham United – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Burnley travel to the London Stadium today for a crucial six-pointer against 18th-placed West Ham United. The Clarets currently sit just one place above their opponents. Therefore, a victory would provide a significant boost to their hopes for survival.
